thread.title: You Must Check Out Anushka Sharma’s New ‘Phillauri’ Inspired Shoes
thread.title_full: You Must Check Out Anushka Sharma’s New ‘Phillauri’ Inspired Shoes

title: You Must Check Out Anushka Sharma’s New ‘Phillauri’ Inspired Shoes
text:
facebook 294 SHARES 
Anushka Sharma is currently on a roll promoting her upcoming film, Phillauri , which releases this Friday, March 24. She has also made sure that these promotions are not done in the usual fashion. From talking to fans onWhatsApp, to having a sweet conversation with a journalist's mother in the middle of a press meet, she is raging at it. 
Yesterday, we caught her at the airport wearing a pair of silver high-tops with the movie's lead character, Phillauri, painted all over the shoes. Now, here is a brand new lesson in movie promotions, right?
